name: Orbiter (itch) (ivanlyuan)
description:
Elevator Pitch: 

      Players will realize how tough it is to predict any kind of movement in space, big props to the people at NASA.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys / WASD : move
  • Left mouse button: attack 
  • Right mouse button: dash (requires energy, which is obtained by killing space squids)

Goal:

  •  Protect your planet from space squids
  •  Don't crash into your own planet
